name: Hexa Merge Puzzles: Match 3 Hexa Puzzles
name_original: Hexa Merge Puzzles: Match 3 Hexa Puzzles
description:
★ 8 amazing match 3 puzzles of hexagons and numbers.

★ All games can be played offline without internet.
★ All games are suitable for the whole family adults and kids.
★ You can save your playing progress to resume it later.
★ Supports both phone & tablet devices with consistent and comfortable UI.

Hexa merge puzzles: big collection of match 3 hexa block puzzles for the whole family adults and kids to practice and improve logic, brain training and deductive reasoning skills. You have to merge 3 or more same adjacent numbers into the next higher numbers.

The 8 hexa games are:-
★ hexa monsters attack puzzle: shoot n merge numbers
★ hexa columns puzzle: drop the number
★ hexa puzzle: shoot n merge numbers
★ hexa puzzle: swap n merge numbers
★ hexa puzzle: drag n merge hexagons
★ hexa puzzle: slide n merge numbers
★ hexa puzzle: tap n merge hexagons
★ hexa puzzle: connect n merge numbers
